alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 7:04PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Chilton, south central Shelby and southeastern Bibb Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 704 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Calera to near Brierfield Ironworks Park to near Ashby. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Calera, Clanton, Montevallo, Jemison, Thorsby, Lawley, Ashby, Gap Of The Mountain, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Lay Lake Dam, Chilton County Motor Sports Park, Mitchell Lake, Lay Lake, Randolph, Minooka Park, Lomax, I 65 Rest Area, Six Mile and Isabella. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
